_description: Canonical domain registry. Add domains here only. Scheduler and queue read from this.
_protocol: Add domain: (1) entry here (2) domains/{name}.md (3) OpenClaw job. NO scheduler edits.

domains.name: camel-finance
domains.description: Camel Finance cycle theory, trade calls, gold/silver/SPX/BTC analysis

domains.name: treasury-bonds
domains.description: TLT position, 10Y yield, Fed rate trajectory, Treasury auction data, tax routing, Section 1256 rules (merged personal-finance 2026-03-01)

domains.name: longevity
domains.description: Lifespan extension, senolytics, rapamycin, NAD+, clinical trials

domains.name: ai-agents
domains.description: Autonomous AI agents, MCP, tool calling, local model infrastructure (merged tool-calling domain 2026-03-01)

domains.name: self-improvement
domains.description: Learning science, habit formation, spaced repetition, cognitive protocols

compound-synthesis.note: Not a research domain — reads feed, synthesizes cross-topic insights. Reclassified as operation 2026-03-01.

_merges: tool-calling -> ai-agents (2026-03-01): no domain file, topic fully contained in ai-agents
personal-finance -> treasury-bonds (2026-03-01): orphan file, no job, TLT-specific content only
